dialogue: I should warn you that I'm a perfectionist.
Do you have any other psychological problems or just the one?
I don't think of it as a "problem."
I guess that's what makes it so bad.
I see a lot of other psycho-logical problems in your writing.
Cognitive dissonance, unrealistic optimism, and some projection bias.
But I can see why you think your perfectionism is the worst part.
